actual_description: Secondly, the user should make the desired amount of money transactions to the wallet.
User can,use either card (debit, credit, ) or,use the 'wallet' feature.
All card information should be stored in the banking systems.
Also, the system should not store the user's card information in the database or anywhere.
When transacting money to the wallet, the system should check the card's status by querying the related banking systems.
When the wallet feature is enabled, the user should be able to view the wallet balance and use it in the payment processes.
